overview.en: EDA is the value network of enterprise data sharing. The network ecology gathers the open source ERP platform Odoo with 3 million enterprise users, serves the SaaS collaboration platform of 100,000 enterprises, and serves many well-known retail brands with more than 50,000 consumer planets. Through the advanced public chain EDA Chain, hundreds of millions of people will build and share a new business ecosystem, providing enterprises with data capitalization and asset digitization solutions, so that everyone has their own digital assets.
overview.zh: EDA是企业数据共享的价值网络，网络生态集合了全球拥有300万家企业用户的开源ERP平台Odoo，服务10万家企业的SaaS协作平台企信，服务多家知名零售品牌拥有5万多用户的消费星球。通过先进公链EDA Chain构建数亿人共建共享的商业新生态，为企业提供数据资产化以及资产数字化解决方案，让人人拥有自己的数字资产。
